ValidationRule.description: When Request Type is set to ‘Full Loan Presentation’, Request Needed By cannot be set within 5 days. Stop user when moving to Credit Underwriting.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.No_Validation__c = False, ISPICKVAL(ffin_Request_Type__c, "Full Loan Presentation"), ffin_Request_Needed_By__c <= (TODAY()+5), ISCHANGED(LLC_BI__Stage__c), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Stage__c, "Credit Underwriting"), LLC_BI__Is_Main__c = TRUE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Request Needed By cannot be set within 5 Business Days when requesting 'Full Loan Presentation'
